tasks.title: [Godshot] Increase daily budget from £100 to £190
tasks.notes: Return budget to seasonal baseline (£190/day = £5,700/month) after Christmas period wind-down. Current budget is £100/day.

tasks.title: [Godshot] Send Christmas period performance report to Sam (1 Nov - 21 Dec)
tasks.notes: Generate and send performance report for Christmas trading period covering 1st November 2025 to 21st December 2025. Key metrics: revenue, ROAS, conversions, budget spend across budget changes (£190/day → £550/day → £100/day). Include insights on Christmas peak performance and product winners.
